name: HTML
description: First code language ever learned related to the coding of web pages and applications.

name: CSS
description: Second code language ever learned related to the coding of web pages and applications, I see myself as very profecient with this code language, using the CSS Grid and Flexbox.

name: JavaScript
description: Third code language learned in the beggining of my career and realized at the moment that this was the language that I needed to excel to become a better developer.

name: Laravel
description: This framework and language (php) were learned at the same time at my first job, from there I made 2 more web apps using this tech stack for my backend and creation of an API.

name: Vue
description: At my first job, I started learning and using Vue for a client with an e-commerce section, it was my first entry project to the world of reactivity. Nowadays I consider myself pretty solid with this technologie and used it in many projects.

name: MySQL
description: I started using this relational database managament system with my projects in Laravel, I learned about models, migrations, relations, cascades and more things about the DB managaement.

name: Foundation
description: I feel pretty comfortable using this framework, I have used it in many of my projects and it helps me a lot with the responsiveness of my sites.

name: Sass
description: Used this styles with foundation for almost all my projects. It is so useful to have your varaibles in a file and use them thorughout the whole projects. Also used loops to create several classes at a time.

name: WordPress
description: This was my first CMS to ever used in my career, I used throught my career to create many sites using the flexible content, ACF and many other tools, such as Algolia and GSAP.

name: GSAP
description: First used with wordpress to add simple fade in animations, but for the butchershop.co site, my team and I went beyond and used it for more things than that like parallax, letters animations, X-axis scrolling and more. Used it for my hero animation here too.

name: Node.js
description: Worked on a project that had an app made with node, so I had to learn more about it to fixed some bugs and made refactors to the app, that later we transcribed to Vue. This was Priio app.

name: React
description: Learned on my freetimes at the time there were no projects in React in my company, later I proposed to work on a internal project with it, and finally helped in a web app and BAM project with Next.JS

name: Typescript
description: Learned by practice and projects that needed to be done with, all the Nuxt projects where done by using ts and the main language, and most recently I participated in a project in Next.js where everything was done with this language

name: Algolia
description: Learned to use it for a project with a big database, to make the request almost instantly. The RockCreek Group project was

name: Statamic
description: CMS mounted over laravel used for the Butchershop.co website. Capable of creating blueprints of elements, it is a good CMS to make really good custom components with Vue for the frontend

name: Nuxt.JS
description: This framework over Vue3 was used for the version Vue of our BAM system, as per request of our client. Used in only that project but got the hang of it

name: Strapi
description: Headless CMS used for the backend part of the BAM project. We needed a headless CMS and we found this brilliant compact and easy to use CMS, planning on using it for a future project

name: MongoDB
description: Learning and being studying it, beacuse I have familiarity with MySql a SQL DB I wanted to learn about a No-SQL DB, planning on using it on a personal project for a friend with a company. I will add the project and my experience as soon as I do the project

name: Express
description: Started studying and using it for a personal project, I will add it as soon as I finish it. The project has the MERN stack

name: TailwindCSS
description: Learned about it in a brief project where I helped with logic bugs, and decided to use it for my portfolio

name: Next.js
description: Started using this framework for a project for the different tools that it has, and helped me to do SSR, and integrate different tools

name: GraphQL
description: Used with Strapi to make the request cleaner and enabled the team to only get exactly the data that we needed

name: Airtable
description: Learned about scripts and automations for a HR project in one company that I had work in. In January 2024 I created an extension script for a company to collect data in the production process

name: Zapier
description: Learned how to use it with Airtable for an internal project for the HR department to send invitations to the interviewees and interviewers
